interface.name: amanda_domtrans_recover
interface.summary: Execute amrecover in the amanda_recover domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: amanda_run_recover
interface.summary: Execute amrecover in the amanda_recover domain, and allow the specified role the amanda_recover domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the amanda_recover domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the amanda_recover domain to use.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: amanda_dontaudit_read_dumpdates
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read /etc/dumpdates.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
